content.question: In lines 7-8, nihil interesse credebam is translated

choices.label: no one believed in the difference
there was nothing different in my belief
no one believed that they were different
I believed that there was nothing different

content.answer: I believed that there was nothing different

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose
